title: WHY RIOT WHY
body:
Why riot its halloween and i am still waiting for my harrowing skins! I bought many rp's for this event and so far i have been disappointed, so PLEASE riot release my skins!!!!!!

EDIT 1: Just an update the skins finally came out on the 5th of November in oceania

replies.body: still every year it has fallen into exactly the same bracket as halloween
They've said time and time again that Harrowing isn't related to exactly when Halloween is, it doesn't even resemble it in the slightest.
its not halloween yet. halloween is an AMERICAN holiday , and ( im assuming australia here ) Aus is roughly 12 hours AHEAD.

> [{quoted}](name=KidConfucius,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=dpA78Xnx,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-10-31T10:08:42.752+0000)
>
> its not halloween yet. halloween is an AMERICAN holiday , and ( im assuming australia here ) Aus is roughly 12 hours AHEAD.

It still would be Halloween in america, not to mention for an Oceanian server it should have Halloween time IN oceania
It's been Halloween in NA since 5pm AEST.

Im sure the staff at riot NA don't stay awake at work on a friday night until 12:01 to release the skins though.
we will likely get the skins when they arrive at work.
they should work something into the code for lol that says give ppl skims at this time
